languages.text: {n}Вместо Вигдис вам отвечает Хейнрикс.{/n} "Умерьте гнев, Вольный Торговец. Судя по описанию, данному Мастером вокса, в систему проникли самые скрытные и изворотливые из рода {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g}, древнейших врагов Человечества. Ваши {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}авгуры{/g} против их технологий бессильны".

{n}Heinrix responds in Vigdis's stead:{/n} "Hold your temper, Rogue Trader. Judging by the Vox Master's description, the system was infiltrated by the most elusive breed of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's ancient enemies. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} are no match for the kind of technology they have at their disposal."

languages.text: {n}海因里希替维格迪斯开了口。{/n}“控制一下你的怒火，行商浪人。根据音阵大师的描述，袭击这个星系的人，应该是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}之中最难以捉摸的族群。他们是人类最古老的宿敌之一，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇矩阵{/g}与他们的先进技术完全无法相提并论。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds in Vigdis's stead:{/n} "Hold your temper, Rogue Trader. Judging by the Vox Master's description, the system was infiltrated by the most elusive breed of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's ancient enemies. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} are no match for the kind of technology they have at their disposal."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希替维格迪斯开了口。{/n}“控制一下你的怒火，行商浪人。根据音阵大师的描述，袭击这个星系的人，应该是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}之中最难以捉摸的族群。他们是人类最古老的宿敌之一，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇矩阵{/g}与他们的先进技术完全无法相提并论。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix répond à la place de Vigdis.{/n} « Calmez-vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. D'après la description de la maîtresse-vox, le système a été infiltré par les plus élusifs des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}, l'une des plus anciennes races ennemies de l'humanité. Face à leur technologie, vos {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} ne font pas le poids. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds in Vigdis's stead:{/n} "Hold your temper, Rogue Trader. Judging by the Vox Master's description, the system was infiltrated by the most elusive breed of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's ancient enemies. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} are no match for the kind of technology they have at their disposal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix répond à la place de Vigdis.{/n} « Calmez-vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. D'après la description de la maîtresse-vox, le système a été infiltré par les plus élusifs des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}, l'une des plus anciennes races ennemies de l'humanité. Face à leur technologie, vos {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} ne font pas le poids. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix responde por Vigdis:{/n} «Contenga su temperamento, Comerciante Independiente. A juzgar por la descripción de la maestra de vocos, el sistema ha sido infiltrado por la raza más esquiva de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, unos de los enemigos más antiguos de la Humanidad. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} no son rival para la tecnología de la que disponen».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds in Vigdis's stead:{/n} "Hold your temper, Rogue Trader. Judging by the Vox Master's description, the system was infiltrated by the most elusive breed of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's ancient enemies. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} are no match for the kind of technology they have at their disposal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix responde por Vigdis:{/n} «Contenga su temperamento, Comerciante Independiente. A juzgar por la descripción de la maestra de vocos, el sistema ha sido infiltrado por la raza más esquiva de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, unos de los enemigos más antiguos de la Humanidad. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} no son rival para la tecnología de la que disponen».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはヴィグディスの代わりに答えた。{/n}「落ち着いて聞いてください、自由開拓者。ヴォクス・マスターの説明によると、人類最古の敵こと、{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}という最も恐ろしい種族がシステムに潜入してしまいました。陛下の{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}は、彼らの技術には敵わないでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds in Vigdis's stead:{/n} "Hold your temper, Rogue Trader. Judging by the Vox Master's description, the system was infiltrated by the most elusive breed of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's ancient enemies. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} are no match for the kind of technology they have at their disposal."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはヴィグディスの代わりに答えた。{/n}「落ち着いて聞くんだ、自由開拓者。ヴォクス・マスターの説明によると、人類最古の敵こと、{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}という最も恐ろしい種族がシステムに潜入してしまった。あなた方の{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}占い{/g}では、彼らの技術には敵わないでしょう」
{n}ハインリックスはヴィグディスの代わりに答えた。{/n}「落ち着いて聞いてください、自由開拓者。ヴォクス・マスターの説明によると、人類最古の敵こと、{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}という最も恐ろしい種族がシステムに潜入してしまいました。陛下の{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}は、彼らの技術には敵わないでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix antwortet an Vigdis' Stelle:{/n} "Zügelt Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Der Beschreibung der Voxmeisterin nach zu urteilen, wurde das System von der gerissensten Sippe der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} heimgesucht, eines der ältesten Feinde der Menschheit. Eure {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} sind ihrer Technologie nicht gewachsen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds in Vigdis's stead:{/n} "Hold your temper, Rogue Trader. Judging by the Vox Master's description, the system was infiltrated by the most elusive breed of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's ancient enemies. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} are no match for the kind of technology they have at their disposal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix antwortet an Vigdis' Stelle:{/n} "Zügelt Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Der Beschreibung der Voxmeisterin nach zu urteilen, wurde das System von der gerissensten Sippe der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} heimgesucht, eines der ältesten Feinde der Menschheit. Eure {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} sind ihrer Technologie nicht gewachsen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, Vigdis'in yerine cevap veriyor.{/n} "Öfkene hâkim ol Hür Tacir. Voks Üstadı'nın tanımına bakarsak sisteme sızanlar, İnsanlığın kadim düşmanlarından biri olan {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldarilerin{/g} en sinsi soyu. Sendeki {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Alametler{/g}, onların ellerindeki teknolojiyle boy ölçüşemez."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds in Vigdis's stead:{/n} "Hold your temper, Rogue Trader. Judging by the Vox Master's description, the system was infiltrated by the most elusive breed of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's ancient enemies. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} are no match for the kind of technology they have at their disposal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, Vigdis'in yerine cevap veriyor:{/n} "Öfkene hâkim ol Hür Tacir. Voks Üstadı'nın tanımına bakarsak sisteme sızan taraf, İnsanlığın en eski düşmanlarından biri olan ve anlaması imkânsız {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} soyudur. {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Alamet{/g}ler, onların ellerindeki teknolojiyle boy ölçüşemez."
